extendedInfo.description: Use your phone as a Spy device to listen on conversations.How to:Click on the config button and set a phone number for example your home number or office number. Using the same config screen set your room noise level. Save your settings go back to main screen and click Start Spying. Trigger :The spying activates when the noise levels in the room meets your configuration settings.It will call the number you configure.Listener: You on the other end will be able to listening to any noise/talk/sounds that are happening on the other end. Some of the possible applications:-May be a baby is sleeping and you are not expecting any unusual noise in that room. But suddenly baby starts crying really loud the ISpy app will call your second phone to alert you.-If you want to listen to some coffee room conversations about you :-). Just place your phonein a room and configure your work number as your listener device. Configure your noise level that should not reach in that room. Your friends walk in start talking the ISpy will kick in and you are listening.-If you have a spare phone install ISpy and you will be able to set it up as a security device to alert you.Features:-The listening device is on speaker phone.-Volume on the listener is mute-You can configure the time interval between your phone calls.Required:Android 3.2 and above.Get the add free version that works on android2.1 and above.Coming soon...Testing:Nexus One (2.3)Atrix 4G (2.3)Unknow:-Since this app uses your telephone device, audio deviceâs it may not be compatible.Laws:Please check your local laws before use. Also you will be charged by your phone service provider for your ISpy calls.  Use it as will not responsible for any harm this app may cause.Enjoy..

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This app isn\'t exactly what you\'d think.  Download Ear Spy got a hearing Mic amplification type app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: As you install it a term and condition popped up saying \"we will not be responsible for any damage this app may course use at your own risk agree I don\'t agree\" when I saw that it was a big turn off and I uninstalled it, please don\'t download because it seems they are expecting something to go wrong
reviews.author: jamesd rainc
